category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‚ÄòDigital transition‚Äô).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe‚Äôs financial contribution to Europe‚Äôs biodiversity‚Äôs path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.description: The MSP developed in the project to ensure identification, engagement, inclusion and active participation of relevant stakeholders and their diverse perspectives is presented in this Deliverable. result.title: Edge and cloud infrastructure resource and computational continuum orchestration system (preliminary)
result.description: This deliverable will report on the outcomes of the WP by fully describing the endtoend orchestration and resource management system An initial version of the deliverable will be released at M21 D21 showing first release of the endtoend orchestration platform an initial network slicing management system the first security and privacy mechanisms for the CHARITY framework and a first iteration of the unified OSS application management

result.title: Energy, data and computational-efficient mechanisms supporting dynamically adaptive and network-aware services (preliminary)
result.description: This deliverable will be a report of development and research activities in WP3 containing all the details pertaining to the mechanisms to support highly dynamic and highly adaptive networkaware services such as the advanced media applications being considered in CHARITY A first version D31 will be released in M24 containing the first efforts towards efficient hardware exploitation efficient data services edge adaptiveness and algorithms for contextualized rendering at the edge
